name: Ardoq
summary: Our aim was to give you unprecedented control and insight into your systems, without the need for complex, expensive tools. So weu2019ve created something that does more than traditional enterprise architecture, costs less and adds real value to your business. details: Our aim was to give you unprecedented control and insight into your systems, without the need for complex, expensive tools. So weu2019ve created something that does more than traditional enterprise architecture, costs less and adds real value to your business. And weu2019ve added unique systems architecture maps, giving you at-a-glance insight, so key decisions are based on the most up-to-data information.

name: Bouquet
summary: Bouquet is an open source toolbox to explore, share and connect your data to applications and visualizations.
details: Bouquet is an open source toolbox to explore, share and connect your data to applications and visualizations.

name: ChurnBee
summary: What? Churn Bee is a SaaS metrics dashboard. Once integrated via an API, you will immediately start getting a visual representation of how is your startup making progress from day to day. Weu0026rsquo;ll do all the math and number crunching - you will understand acquisition, activation, retention, growth and other relevant metrics for your startup. Why? Many startups end up building tools and dashboar
details: What? Churn Bee is a SaaS metrics dashboard. Once integrated via an API, you will immediately start getting a visual representation of how is your startup making progress from day to day. Weu0026rsquo;ll do all the math and number crunching - you will understand acquisition, activation, retention, growth and other relevant metrics for your startup. Why? Many startups end up building tools and dashboards internally. In fact all the successful startups do. Built by entrepreneurs, for entrepreneurs, Churn Bee will give you the actionable data you need so that you can focus on making the best decisions.

name: dataseed
summary: Dataseed is a simple, flexible platform for interactive data visualisation, analysis and reporting. Whether you need to be up and running in minutes or require a custom solution tailored to your business requirements - weve got you covered.
details: Dataseed is a simple, flexible platform for interactive data visualisation, analysis and reporting. Whether you need to be up and running in minutes or require a custom solution tailored to your business requirements - weve got you covered.

name: geocommons
summary: GeoIQ is the engine that powers the GeoCommons Community. GeoIQ includes a full Application Programming Interface (API) that allows developers to build unique and powerful domain specific applications. The API provides capability for uploading and download data, searching for data and maps, building, embedding, and theming maps or charts, as well as general user, group, and permissions management.
details: GeoIQ is the engine that powers the GeoCommons Community. GeoIQ includes a full Application Programming Interface (API) that allows developers to build unique and powerful domain specific applications. The API provides capability for uploading and download data, searching for data and maps, building, embedding, and theming maps or charts, as well as general user, group, and permissions management.

name: Google
summary: A Google API for rendering data driven visualizations to a website.
details: A Google API for rendering data driven visualizations to a website.

name: HighCharts
summary: Highcharts is a charting library written in pure JavaScript, offering an easy way of adding interactive charts to your web site or web application. Highcharts currently supports line, spline, area, areaspline, column, bar, pie, scatter, angular gauges, arearange, areasplinerange, columnrange, bubble, box plot, error bars, funnel, waterfall and polar chart types.
details: Highcharts is a charting library written in pure JavaScript, offering an easy way of adding interactive charts to your web site or web application. Highcharts currently supports line, spline, area, areaspline, column, bar, pie, scatter, angular gauges, arearange, areasplinerange, columnrange, bubble, box plot, error bars, funnel, waterfall and polar chart types.

name: Hyperglance
summary: Hyperglance simplifies your IT estate into a cohesive whole with an amazing new level of dynamic visibility and control. Hyperglance is a leading-edge software company that specializes in IT relationship modeling with easy to use, dynamic, and gaming style graphics which enable organizations to gain greater business context, insight, and control over complete IT estates end-to-end. Hyperglance, is
details: Hyperglance simplifies your IT estate into a cohesive whole with an amazing new level of dynamic visibility and control. Hyperglance is a leading-edge software company that specializes in IT relationship modeling with easy to use, dynamic, and gaming style graphics which enable organizations to gain greater business context, insight, and control over complete IT estates end-to-end. Hyperglance, is the worldu2019s first IT modelling and visualization solution that cuts through the complexity of modern virtual and physical IT systems to give small to large enterprise organizations a comprehensive, interactive, 3D topology view of their many, often disparate, layers of IT, or what we like to call IT u201crelationshipsu201d.

name: iCharts
summary: iCharts is a U.S. based SaaS company providing an easy and affordable online service for interactive chart creation and social sharing. iCharts offerings range from free consumer subscriptions to high-end business subscriptions. The companys vision is to empower the world to explore and share data by enabling the free flow of visual data among data owners, media, business and consumers.
details: iCharts is a U.S. based SaaS company providing an easy and affordable online service for interactive chart creation and social sharing. iCharts offerings range from free consumer subscriptions to high-end business subscriptions. The companys vision is to empower the world to explore and share data by enabling the free flow of visual data among data owners, media, business and consumers.

name: Information is Beautiful
summary: Myself, and the rest of the crack team here at Information is Beautiful, are dedicated to distilling the worldu0026rsquo;s data, information and knowledge into beautiful, interesting and, above all, useful visualizations, infographics and diagrams.
details: Myself, and the rest of the crack team here at Information is Beautiful, are dedicated to distilling the worldu0026rsquo;s data, information and knowledge into beautiful, interesting and, above all, useful visualizations, infographics and diagrams.

name: Keen Dashboards
summary: Responsive dashboard templates for Bootstrap. Building a dashboard for your customers? Need a quick and easy way to share stuff with your team? Check out the new keen/dashboards on Github and get up and running super quick with great-looking, customizable dashboard templates. Each template is composed of a minimal set of custom styles built on top of Bootstrap v3.2, covering some of the most commo
details: Responsive dashboard templates for Bootstrap. Building a dashboard for your customers? Need a quick and easy way to share stuff with your team? Check out the new keen/dashboards on Github and get up and running super quick with great-looking, customizable dashboard templates. Each template is composed of a minimal set of custom styles built on top of Bootstrap v3.2, covering some of the most common dashboard use cases and layout configurations.

name: Keen IO
summary: Keen.io helps app developers build custom analytics u0026amp; data science features directly into their mobile apps and web dashboards, by providing the infrastructure and APIs to collect data and build analytics into your business.
details: Keen.io helps app developers build custom analytics u0026amp; data science features directly into their mobile apps and web dashboards, by providing the infrastructure and APIs to collect data and build analytics into your business.

name: Leftronic
summary: Leftronic is a Y Combinator-funded company that develops a web-based real-time dashboard application for monitoring a companyu0026rsquo;s most important data. Leftronic business dashboards retrieve a companyu0026rsquo;s metrics from popular services such as Google Analytics, Twitter, Zendesk and others, as well as receive custom metrics through a super-simple API. The dashboards update in real-time and ar
details: Leftronic is a Y Combinator-funded company that develops a web-based real-time dashboard application for monitoring a companyu0026rsquo;s most important data. Leftronic business dashboards retrieve a companyu0026rsquo;s metrics from popular services such as Google Analytics, Twitter, Zendesk and others, as well as receive custom metrics through a super-simple API. The dashboards update in real-time and are designed for large screens. This makes it easy for teams to monitor their companyu0026rsquo;s critical metrics.u0026lt;/pu0026gt;

name: Lightning
summary: Lightning is a data-visualization server providing API-based access to reproducible, web-based, interactive visualizations. It includes a core set of visualization types, but is built for extendability and customization. Lightning supports modern libraries like d3.js and three.js, and is designed for interactivity over large data sets and continuously updating data streams.
details: Lightning is a data-visualization server providing API-based access to reproducible, web-based, interactive visualizations. It includes a core set of visualization types, but is built for extendability and customization. Lightning supports modern libraries like d3.js and three.js, and is designed for interactivity over large data sets and continuously updating data streams.

name: MathWorks
summary: The MathWorks, Inc. (branded as simply MathWorks) is an American privately held corporation that specializes in mathematical computing software. Its major products include MATLAB and Simulink. As of April 2014, it employed over 3,000 people worldwide with 70% located at the companys headquarters in Natick, Massachusetts, United States.
details: The MathWorks, Inc. (branded as simply MathWorks) is an American privately held corporation that specializes in mathematical computing software. Its major products include MATLAB and Simulink. As of April 2014, it employed over 3,000 people worldwide with 70% located at the companys headquarters in Natick, Massachusetts, United States.

name: Mohiomap
summary: Mohiomap lets you search across several Cloud platforms at once, rendering the results as a dynamic Mind Map. Connect your u0026nbsp;Dropbox, u0026nbsp; Evernote, and u0026nbsp;Google Drive accounts and find what you are looking for the visual way.
details: Mohiomap lets you search across several Cloud platforms at once, rendering the results as a dynamic Mind Map. Connect your u0026nbsp;Dropbox, u0026nbsp; Evernote, and u0026nbsp;Google Drive accounts and find what you are looking for the visual way.

name: Periscope Data
summary: Periscope plugs directly into your databases and lets you run, save, and share analyses over billions of data rows in seconds. By plugging into database, marketing and billing systems, it can show customers how email and SMS affect user retention; which sales channels produce the most loyal users; and how many users use both web and mobile frontends.
details: Periscope plugs directly into your databases and lets you run, save, and share analyses over billions of data rows in seconds. By plugging into database, marketing and billing systems, it can show customers how email and SMS affect user retention; which sales channels produce the most loyal users; and how many users use both web and mobile frontends.

name: plotly
summary: Plotly makes it easy to analyze and visualize data together. Using Plotly, users can import data from anywhere, analyze it with Python, and stats tools, and visualize data. Users can also share work and collaborate on projects.
details: Plotly makes it easy to analyze and visualize data together. Using Plotly, users can import data from anywhere, analyze it with Python, and stats tools, and visualize data. Users can also share work and collaborate on projects.

name: Quandl
summary: Were collecting all the numerical data in the world. We have one mission: to help users find the data they need, in the format they want. Fast. We support open data; we believe that free public data should remain free and public. We respect copyright; we believe that data creators should own their data creations. We are an open platform. The same tools we use to add and update the data on this sit
details: Were collecting all the numerical data in the world. We have one mission: to help users find the data they need, in the format they want. Fast. We support open data; we believe that free public data should remain free and public. We respect copyright; we believe that data creators should own their data creations. We are an open platform. The same tools we use to add and update the data on this site are available for you to use right now.

name: Recharts
summary: A composable charting library built on React components. Recharts makes it easy to integrate charts into your React application.u0026nbsp;
details: A composable charting library built on React components. Recharts makes it easy to integrate charts into your React application.u0026nbsp;
